channel.title: Server crashing
channel.description: Hi guys :), after a many attemp to solve my problem ive finally come here to ask for some help. My problem is, for every 317 client with source i try im able to log in succesfully but once i decide to tell my character to walk somewhere, the client crashes. I tryed with many clients and everytime its happend the same. I have jdk 6u21 and my environement variable are set. This problem because annoying as im developing a server right now and i may want to test some features i will be adding but there no way i can do this. Please help :) thanks!

item.title: Server crashing
item.dc:creator: @kossploss kossploss
item.description:
@kossploss wrote:

[quote=“Exion, post:6, topic:365738”][quote author=Liquid Magic link=topic=461935.msg3379263#msg3379263 date=1287888607]
Aye, bro.

Download this:

Download.com

Bat To Exe Converter Portable

Bat To Exe Converter converts batch (bat) script files to executable (.exe) files. Features: Extended commands Visible and invisible applications

Run that program, and make your run.bat an executable file. (run.exe).

[/quote]
:facepalm:

Anyways, to fix this, take a look at this thread: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,409149.0.html[/quote]

One nice and good working solution thanks Exion :D!

Read full topic

item.title: Server crashing
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

[quote=“Liquid Magic, post:4, topic:365738”][quote author=kossploss link=topic=461935.msg3379267#msg3379267 date=1287888806]
um i had this and its did not work may this help im currently on Windows 7 (64 bits)
[/quote]

Yeah, retard. That will solve your problem. I have Windows 7 64-bit, and once you compile YOUR RUN.BAT FOR YOUR CLIENT IT WILL TURN INTO AN EXECUTABLE AND THUS MAKING IT WORK. MAGICALLY.[/quote]If not troll:
You realize that it is still a batch file just encoded as an executable?

Read full topic

kossploss:

um i had this and its did not work may this help im currently on Windows 7 (64 bits)

Yeah, retard. That will solve your problem. I have Windows 7 64-bit, and once you compile YOUR RUN.BAT FOR YOUR CLIENT IT WILL TURN INTO AN EXECUTABLE AND THUS MAKING IT WORK. MAGICALLY.
